column3: â€œThis shit won't have you digging any tunnels under prisons. You're not escaping from this high.â€

â€œOne of my favorite strains of all time! Really dense and super sticky. Has a really good high and hits you right instantly!â€

â€œThis strain did it all 4 me! Anxiety, depression, insomnia, knee pain all crushed instantly. Piney for sure & definitely OG tasting! Only set back is all out & haven't been able to get more. Apparently it's a rare strain already!â€

â€œThis is a feel good strain. I like this strain alot. It tastes sweet and very smooth on the throat. It hits you immediately and give a feel of relaxation and peace. One of my favorites for Nightâ€

â€œAmazing. And despite what others have said this potent indica isn't nearly as sedative to me as powerhouses like death bubba and GDP but the mellow stone is pleasant and pulsating throughout my bodyâ€

â€œNot for the weekend smokers! Very hard hitting couch locker.tastes amazing a little bit like stardawg.creamy candy taste along with a super powerful high! 10 out of 10 on tat high and appearance !â€

â€œDefinitely not a wake and bake bud... will put yu back in bed with a euphoric feeling that settles you in a very relaxed place. I do not recommend for any beginner or any day time activity.. I love this strain it does me just right. No anxiety no type of paranoia.. just blissfully relaxed and no spasms. Perfect for patients that suffer anxiety, insomnia, ptsd and Pain. I hope yâ€™all enjoy el chapo like I did. ğŸ¤¤ happy...â€

â€œThis El Chapo Nug Run Resin has a delightful flavor. The Light Lemony Fruity Notes are wonderful on the tounge. This particular Cured Resin by Oil Supply Company gives an uplifting experience as you first dab. Very heady and euphoric feelings. I can feel an anxiety melt away and it feels very relaxed. This feeling is great for an end of day, night time experience.â€

â€œI've had a few diff Chapo's from many different growers, but I've never really appreciated it til I took the gene into my own hands. â€œProbably my go-to smoke at bedtime for insomnia and chronic pain.  An all over body relaxation.  A bit of dryness in the eyes and mouth but definitely worth it.  Not much Euphoria just complete relaxation.  Highly recommended for pain and insomniaâ€

â€œYeahhhh buddy. This is a nighttime strain! It's very earthy. It looks nice as well, which is always a plus when you're smoking. I woke up feeling great because it helped with my pain and nerves. Hopefully El Chapo won't escape from my dispensary too soon!â€

â€œI wanted to say that a little goes a long way. This has been great for pain and anxiety. Definitely good for PMS and inflammation. All you need is a pipe or a bong for this one and a few hits. I always tend to smoke a lot more in a joint, and it will definitely knock you on your ass and give you the munchies in the most wicked way ever. I get a bad sweet tooth when I use this strain, but as long as it's something hea...â€

â€œReally nice relaxing high. I differ from the other commenters because I found this to be a little bit of a creeper. It has a really nice body high also. I feel completely relaxed but not spacey. Literally feels like being in a warm bath lolâ€

â€œI thought I could hang with this strain and NOT get sleepy or glued to the couch.  Wrong.  I became a sofa surfer in no time and vegged out with some movies lol.
